historical_summary: Xavier experienced job loss, which led to a period of introspection and a renewed focus on trading and blockchain technologies.
He explored market trends, reconnected with old contacts, and started setting up new strategies in the crypto world.
Xavier's interest in blockchain and trading led him to explore quant finance and algorithmic trading models.
